summary: An Ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense, by the mode of payment by bonds, for the laying off, extending and establishing of Beacon Avenue, from Fourteenth Avenue South to Twelfth Avenue South, and for the laying off, extending, widening, altering and establishing of Beacon Avenue, from south line of Section Sixteen (16), Township Twenty-four (24) North, Range Four (4) East, W. M., to Thirty-ninth Avenue South; of Thirty-ninth Avenue South, from Beacon Avenue to Roxbury Street; of Roxbury Street, from Thirty-ninth Avenue South to Carkeek Drive; of Henderson Street, from Carckeek Drive to Forty-third Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle.
